page.title: 12LANGUAGE PENALLT
page.content: { CHILDREN'S SAYINGS 1.If you pick dandelions you will wet the bed. 2.Hold a buttercup under someone's chin to see if they like butter. 3.Whatever you are doing when you first hear the cuckoo, you will do for the rest of the year. {4.Oak before the Ash,}we shall have a splash. Ash before Oak, we shall have a soak. {5.If you leave the lid off the teapot when the tea is freshly made, you will have a visitor. 6.If you see an ambulance, touch your collar. 7.Catch leaves in October to get a lucky day. {8.If you tread on a black beetle it {will rain. 9.If you find a wing feather, stick it in the ground and wish.
